entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
